resources.string: Cemiuiler uses some or all of the following open source projects, thanks to the developers of these projects for their support (in no particular order)
Thanks to the following contributors for their help in the development of Cemiuiler (in no particular order)
You can support us by donating here
Help us translate Cemiuiler into you language

- Does not support any unofficial ROM usage

Now you have to manually enable permissions for this option.
NFC is automatically turned on when entering the card swiping page, and it is automatically turned off when exiting

"Are you sure you want to restart now "

True preservation requires underlying support from the device model

Experimental features. Make the secondary SIM-card support SA
Use mobile data during VoLTE calls on the secondary SIM
Enter *#*#65686633#*#* on the dial interface to Support N5/N8 Band. If it shows "enable N5 and N8 Mode", the feature will enable successfully.

This is a high-risk feature, any problems arising from this will be borne by the user, please be careful to back up your baseband. Enter *#*#MODEMTEST#*#* on the dial interface to open the MTB Settings
